pt.ptcris.utils

Class ORCIDBulkGetWorker

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • pt.ptcris.utils.ORCIDWorker
        • pt.ptcris.utils.ORCIDBulkGetWorker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public final class ORCIDBulkGetWorker
extends ORCIDWorker
    A worker thread that can be used to GET works from ORCID.
    See Also:
    ORCIDWorker

    • Constructor Detail

      • ORCIDBulkGetWorker

        public ORCIDBulkGetWorker(java.util.List<org.um.dsi.gavea.orcid.model.work.WorkSummary> works,
                          ORCIDClient client,
                          java.util.Map<java.math.BigInteger,PTCRISyncResult> cb,
                          org.slf4j.Logger log)
                   throws java.security.InvalidParameterException,
                          java.lang.NullPointerException
        A threaded worker that can be launched in parallel to GET works with the ORCID API. The provided client defines the communication channel.
        Parameters:
        works - the summary specifying the full work to be retrieved
        client - the ORCID communication client
        cb - the callback object to return results
        log - a logger
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the work is null
        java.security.InvalidParameterException - if the work's put-code is undefined
        See Also:
        ORCIDHelper.getFullWork(WorkSummary, Map)
